name: NYAN 3D
description:
NYAN 3D is a procedurally generated space adventure featuring feline Heroes from our beloved series of tubes: The Internets! We made NYAN 3D completely free so everyone can enjoy it. No ads. No lite version. No popups. A lot of hard work went into creating NYAN 3D, so if you want to see more updates and new games from us please consider buying the $0.99 Support the Developers In-App Purchase. Help us spread the word, rate and review NYAN 3D!

Check out the Official Game Trailer at:
http://www.nyan3d.com

• A PROCEDURALLY EVOLVING UNIVERSE!
NYAN 3D randomly generates unique and challenging obstacles each round, so you’ll never play the same level twice. Difficulty automatically adjusts based on your overall performance.

• DEFLECT OR DODGE OBSTACLES!
Blue tokens activate a shield to deflect obstacles or play dangerously and string together near miss combos for bonus points.

• ENGAGE NYANSPEED!
Collect three gold tokens to go NYANSPEED! During this burst of speed, your Hero will deflect anything that get in the way.

• UNLOCK NEW HEROES!
Heroes can be unlocked through various achievements: Travel over one million meters, collect a thousand tokens, near misses, and much more.

• COMPETE FOR GLOBAL DOMINATION!
Dodge your way to the top! Your global rank is updated after each round. Compete in various Game Center leaderboards for both hardcore and casual players.
